Direct Known Subclasses:
AreaChartDemo, AreaChartForCategoryDataDemo, CombinedXYPlotDemo, DynamicDataDemo, GanttDemo, HorizontalBar3DDemo, HorizontalBarChartDemo, LineChartDemo1, LineChartDemo2, MouseListenerDemo1, MouseListenerDemo2, MultiShapesXYDemo, OverlaidCategoryChartDemo, OverlaidPlotDemo, OverlaidXYPlotDemo, PieChartDemo1, PriceVolumeDemo, TimeSeriesDemo, TimeSeriesDemo2, VerticalBar3DDemo, VerticalBarChartDemo, XYSeriesDemo
public class ApplicationFrame
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements java.awt.event.WindowListener

A base class for creating the main frame for simple applications. The frame listens for window closing events, and responds by shutting down the JVM. This is OK for small demo applications...for more serious applications, you'll want to use something more robust.

See Also:
